remarks: Lemma for ~ srabase and similar theorems.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
statement:
srapart.a $e |- ( ph -> A = ( ( subringAlg ` W ) ` S ) ) $.
srapart.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ ( Base ` W ) ) $.
sralem.1 $e |- E = Slot N $.
sralem.2 $e |- N e. NN $.
sralem.3 $e |- ( N < 5 \/ 8 < N ) $.
sralem $p |- ( ph -> ( E ` W ) = ( E ` A ) ) $.
